MRKB.ActorSelectorTooltip:
[Left Click]: Change Actor
[Right Click]: Add / Remove Favorite
[Ctrl + Left Click]: Open Sheet
MRKB.ChatEditPlaceholder: Edit Mode: [Enter] to Save, [Esc] to Cancel
MRKB.IncludeCSSTooltip: Check this if the CSS import is required in the HTML file. This ensures that the formatting is preserved in a single file. Do not check this if you are using CSS in a separate environment.
MRKB.OrderFlagTooltip: Exports messages sorted by the Order Flag, which is set relatively according to the message list when the message is created. May not be available in some cases.
MRKB.TimestampTooltip: Exports messages sorted by the Timestamp, which is set according to the client time when the message is created. The order may be mixed if there is a discrepancy in the time of the personal computer.
